WorkItem.Description:
I noticed the default Destrolock rotation includes Corruption.
According to EJ number-crunchers, Corruption isn't worth it to Destros when standing still and nuking, and is only for movement periods in fights.
http://elitistjerks.com/f80/t38033-mage_equivalent_destruction_warlock/#Destruction
Â 
I checked it out a bit in Rawr 2.3.17, and my rotation does indeed have a higher DPS without it than with it.
(Attached: Lucifel Destro replenish)
I know you've got a lot on your plate as it is with the Lock module, but it might be worth a sec to snip that out of the default rotation when you get a chance.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Warlock] Take Corruption out of the Default Rotation
